title: Auckland Armageddon October

embed.description: Experience the Incredible with the massive Auckland Armageddon Expo. Amusements, Gaming, Collectibles, E-Sports, TV and Movie stars, Anime, Cosplay,...

body:
Is riot and league gonna be involved in Armageddon this year?..

It hasn't been in it for a few years so idk of it will be this year but is there any events like rivals of the rift or friends of the rift like last year which was league related..

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

I don't know how valid this info I have for but I hear the finals of the high school league of legends competition will be here?

In the middle of high school exams LMAO 
Good luck to them

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k4EAZA5P,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-17T22:20:19.628+0000)
>
> In the middle of high school exams LMAO 
> Good luck to them

Hey, a little birdie told me ...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}  

Don't take my word on it, just heard this not sure if they were serious or if I was being gullible!
